subject: HELLO,
body:
HELLO,
 Commercial Industrial Enterprises, was started in June 2002 by
Andrew Yuan  Managing Director, We are into Oil Blocking Booms and
Ropes, Water Supply & Purification - Water Sources: Watershed/Aquifer
Protection Stabilization Restoration, Oil Spill Barriers, Slick
Decomposition, Coral Reef Rehabilitation, Hydrologic Engineering, Well
Drilling, Reservoirs, Waste Management - Refuse Containing: Storage
Drums, Tanks, Containers, Sealants, Encapsulation.,
We are also into export and import of the products mentioned above and
equipment. Our company " Commerce Industrial Enterprises " is a new
and established firm that proposes to come up with a lot of business
innovation shortly., 
We are interested in employing your
services, in working with us as our payment agent who can help us
establish a medium of receiving payment on our behalf for Goods and
raw materials we supply to our customers in Europe, South, and North
America, Australia e.t.c 
If you are interested in transacting business
with us.,
We will be delighted. Subject to your satisfaction you will be given
the opportunity to negotiate the mode by which we will pay for your
services as our representative in Europe, America, Australia, etc.
Please
 if you are interested, forward us your phone/fax number and
your full contact.
Thank you and we await your further response.,
Sincerely Andrew Yuan Managing Director   Commercial Industrial
Enterprises   Street No. 211, Wuyuan Rd., North District, Taichung
404-58, Taiwan Tel:/fax 886-9162278

subject: Re: HELLO,
body:
Hello Andrew Yuan,

Thank you for reaching out and providing such detailed information about your company, Commercial Industrial. It's fascinating to hear about the work you're doing in Oil Blocking Booms and Ropes, Water Supply Water Sources Watershed Aquifer Protection Oil Spill Barriers, Slick Coral Reef Hydrologic Well Drilling, Waste Management Refuse Containing Storage Drums, Tanks, Sealants and more.

I'm intrigued by the opportunity to work as a payment agent for your company. However, I would like to understand more about this role. Could you please elaborate on what exactly my responsibilities would be? 

Also, could you provide some more details about how the payment process works? How would I be receiving these payments on your behalf?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Austin

subject: Re: HELLO,
body:
Dear Austin,
Thanks for your swift response. All we need from you is to submit the
following to us.  1. Your complete names,   2. Your complete mailing
address   3. Your phone contacts   4. Your complete house address   5. Your
occupation, business, area of specialization e.t.c   6. Your bank details
and PayPal email address   With the above-required information from you, we
will ask any of our customers who can be able to make a payment to us
through you.  You shall be entitled to a monthly salary of $5,000 plus a
10% commission on every Account/Payment you receive on behalf of commerce
industrial enterprise. from its customers/clients. Also if we are satisfied
with your services to the company within 90 days (3 Months) of your
employment, we shall increase your monthly allowance by 12%.   I hope the
above-stated terms are clear for your understanding. I await your further
response.   Sincerely,  Andrew Yua
